name: Just Roll With It (itch) (MichaelKamka)
description:
When you roll the dice, are you one to keep pushing your luck, or simply take things as they come? When your backs against the wall, do you panic, or do you have what it takes to Just Roll With It?

In this frantic, top-down shooter you'll face unrelenting waves of the undead - but your means of defense are left up to a roll of the dice!

Each run you'll get a random weapon, ammo-type, and power-up. Tempt fate and reroll for a favorable combo, or improvise with what your given.

The undead won't stop coming, but just how many do you think you can take down with you? Let's find out!
